item.title: A place on Earth, water but no life
item.description: A place on Earth, water but no life Scientists found a place in Ethiopia where there’s water but it has no living life, link. Dallol, Ethiopia credit:Puri Lopez-Garcia What does it mean to us? Well not very good news, I am afraid. That could indicate that even if there are places in and out of our solar system that have water, there might not be life there.
